lines.text: [first lines]

[reining in horse]
Mel! You behave! Mel! You're gonna get us killed! Whoa! You son of a bitch! Goddamn it!
How's the rest of the family. Anyone else in the hospital?
Not the ones who deserve it most.
Have you ever shot a horse before?
Only the losers.
She could be getting raped!
She is not getting raped, believe me. They're getting raped.
Katie? What are you doing here?

[holding gun]
I just came to shoot a horse.
[smile quickly fades]

[drunk]
We were born here. This is where we were born and raised, Bertrum.
You don't have to tell me where I was born and raised. I know damn well where I was born and raised!

[slurring]
I was just sayin', that's the reason we're here.
What's the reason!
The reason we never left... Is cuz we were born here...
[takes another swig]
You are a piss poor excuse for a relative, you know that?
[swipes his bottle]

[forgetful]
Where's my Katie? Is my Katie here? She wouldn't allow all this to happen to me. She wouldn't allow it.
She's at the hospital, mama. With dad.
She's not injured, is she?
No, mama. Dad's injured.
Oh, he was *born* injured.
I wouldn't worry too much about it, dear. Jilly knows the woods.
Not like she used to. She's a teenager now, she doesn't know anything like she used to. She gets lost in her own bedroom now.
You ever thought about what you're gonna do after you shoot your one and only horse, Bertrum? Huh? Who's gonna pull your buckboard then?
[last lines]

[looking at old photo]
Who is it? It's not me, is it?
No, mama. It's me, and the girls.
Where are all the men?
